title: Perfect Potato Croquettes
ingredients: ['8-10 potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', 'Sauce', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 medium onions, diced', '1 carrot, peeled and diced (optional)', '1 dessertspoon salt', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules (optional)', '1 teaspoon white pepper', 'cornflour, as needed', '2 eggs, beaten', 'Japanese breadcrumbs (panko), as needed', 'oil for deep frying']
